name: Spin Gallery
description:
Spin gallery is a brand-new 3D puzzle & brain teaser game! Swipe to rotate the puzzle until you see a complete picture. Dive into a whole new 3D puzzle experience! Before you solve the puzzle, you never know what the artwork is!  

FEATURES:
 - Super relaxing gameplay: no time limit, no restrictions, take your time and relax with this beautiful puzzle game.
 - Tons of puzzles to solve! Challenge your brain and unlock all artworks!
 - Beautiful artworks appropriate for all ages!
- Save as your wallpaper!  Can you solve all the puzzles? Come play and relax now with Spin gallery!
